title: What if Gragas was able to share his drinks with allies?
body: I mean, who doesn't enjoy a pint of ale now and then (or whatever Gragas is drinking)? This could be an interesting change for Gragas. Sharing a drink with an ally grants them the same effects it would've granted Gragas. I'm referring to his 'w' btw, for anyone who's confused.
